name: Space Toxin
description:
Space Toxin is a platform game about space laboratory that research secret substances for surviving on dangerous planet, which atmosphere is full of acid. Our hero is Zhao the lab technician who is new at this place. One day something happened with all sprayers of s.p.a.c.e. substance, which protect the air from dangerous gas... And so our adventure begins!

Tools:
Unity, Fl Studio, Aseprite

Controls:
W,A,S,D - move
E - use something (button or terminal)
R - restart
Esc - exit

Team:

  • Ilya Voluiskiy (stap2103) - artist, character designer, music creator
  • Ivan Kalinin (rexagon) - main unity programmer, level artist
  • Stepan Lvovskiy (mrgovart) - level designer
  • Artem Pyatnitskiy (asharnrus) - second unity programmer

Hints:
If you see terminal (something like small screen) or button (small and green/red), try to interact with it (using E)!!

Good Luck Everyone!
